long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Share the screen in a screen sharing call with your team members.
This Ciao extension allows users to share their screen to show presentations, photos and documents for scenarios such as remote support, video collaboration, and online assistance.

Install it to hold efficient online meetings.

- The extension will present a menu of which application or Chrome tab to share
- The item selected will be shared to the other party.
- Participants can view the shared screen in fullscreen
- Caller can stop sharing the screen and still in a call by clicking the ’stop sharing’ icon during the call

Download Ciao extension to share the screen with your team and show them visual information.
Callee can see the screen either web(Chrome) or mobile(Android/iOS) and no download or preparation needed, even on their mobile.
